exclusion.criterion: pericardial constriction or tamponage on echo or by other imaging modality
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: inability to provide informed consent or unable or unwilling to follow protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. Hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism history. Smokes 1 pack per day for 40 years.
